articles.author: DARLENE SUPERVILLE
articles.title: Harris says crude and racist rhetoric at Trump’s event fans the fuel of division - The Associated Press
articles.description: Vice President Kamala Harris says none of the racist and crude rhetoric that was featured at Donald Trump's Madison Square Garden rally will support Americans' dreams and aspirations. She says that type of language is just “fanning the fuel of trying to divid…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) Vice President Kamala Harris said Monday that none of the vitriol at Donald Trumps Madison Square Garden rally will support the dreams and aspirations of the American people but inste… [+1460 chars]
